title: Create Dashboard Component with Carbon Emissions Overview

objective.i_want: to see my total carbon emissions at a glance on a dashboard
objective.so_that: I can quickly understand my environmental impact and track progress

acceptance_criteria.description: Dashboard displays total carbon emissions in kg CO2e format
Dashboard shows emissions breakdown by category (transport, food, energy)
Dashboard includes a monthly trend chart showing last 6 months
Dashboard displays reduction goal progress as percentage
Component is responsive and works on mobile devices

stop_conditions: Never expose API keys or secrets in client-side code
Never commit directly to main branch
Stop if constitutional AI score drops below 0.9
Stop if any test failures occur in CI
